title: ** User Login
preconditions: User is on the login page at https://the-internet.herokuapp.com/login
User has entered their username and password
main_flow: User enters their username into the 'Username' input field.
User enters their password into the 'Password' input field.
4. The System receives the username and password.
5. The System checks if the provided credentials are valid.
6. If the provided credentials are invalid, The System displays an error message.
7. If the provided credentials are valid, The System displays a success message and grants access to the secure area.
If the credentials are still invalid, The System continues to display error messages.
User can click on the 'Logout' button to leave the secure area.
postconditions: If the credentials were invalid, The User remains on the login page.
If the credentials were valid, The User is granted access to the secure area.
